name: Blue vs. Red
description: Blue vs. Red is a small-time video game I made. It's only one level and can be played up to two players. They play as either a blue or red rabbit and must race to the end of the obstacle course while avoiding traps, collecting coins, and bouncing balls used to make it a bit challenging and fun. Whoever gets to the end of the obstacle course and collects the key, will win! Interested? Or just want to have a game to compete with each other? Then download now!
